types.description: Representation of a parsed mailbox string (see RFC 5322, section 3.4).

name.description: The <value>display-name</value> associated with the provided address or group, if available.

email.description: The <value>addr-spec</value> associated with the provided address, if available.

group.description: The members of the group, if available.

functions.name: formatFileSize
functions.description: Returns the provided file size in a human readable format (e.g. <value>12 bytes</value> or <value>11,4 GB</value>).

functions.name: parseMailboxString
functions.description: Parse a mailbox string containing one or more email addresses (see RFC 5322, section 3.4).

parameters.name: mailboxString
parameters.description: The string to be parsed (e.g. <value>User <user@example.com>, other-user@example.com</value>)

parameters.name: preserveGroups
parameters.description: Keep grouped hierachies. Groups may be specified in a mailbox string as follows: <value>GroupName : user1 <user1@example.com>, user2@example,com ;</value>.
